name: deezer.com - Dark
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("deezer.com") {

/* Hide */
#visio_content,
.edito_blog
    {display: none !important;}

/* Dark BG  */
body,
#naboo,
.pageedito,
.edito_selection,
#naboo_menu,
.ui-widget-content,
#naboo_menu_list_music.ui-droppable,
.edito_top-titles,
#profil-user,
#feed-user,
.naboo_home_empty_module,
.naboo_home_empty_module_nav,
#naboo_album,
.naboo_head,
.datagrid_album,
.tab_comments_content,
#naboo_tab,
.tab_related_content,
.tab_disco_content,
.bg_white,
ul#naboo_datagrid.bg_dg-alt1,

.datagrid_loved .naboo_datagrid_bt_option, .datagrid_playlist .naboo_datagrid_bt_option, .datagrid_mp3 .naboo_datagrid_bt_option, .datagrid_dwl .naboo_datagrid_bt_option, .datagrid_search .naboo_datagrid_bt_option, .datagrid_folder .naboo_datagrid_bt_option, .datagrid_tracks .naboo_datagrid_bt_option
    {
    background: #222 !important;
    color: #666 !important;
    }

/* Black BG */
.naboo_home_empty_module_nav li a.selected,
dd.loved.ui-draggable,
dd.play.relative.ui-draggable,
dd.song.ui-draggable,
dd.artist.ui-draggable,
dd.album.ui-draggable,
dd.time.ui-draggable,
dd.note.ui-draggable,
dd.check.ui-draggable,
#naboo_tops_listing,
#page_recommendations .playlists,
#page_recommendations .concerts .concerts-empty,
.area_filters,
.showcase .apps_container .applist_container,
div.app_cat_menu,
#naboo_home_navbar td a.selected
    {
    background: #111 !important;
    color: #666 !important;
    }
#page_recommendations .artists,
#page_recommendations .columns
    {background-color: #222 !important;}

#page_recommendations .top-friends,
#page_recommendations .messages .message-row
    {
    background-color: #111 !important;
    color: #666 !important;
    }

/* Font */

    /* No Shadows */
    .heading-1, 
    .naboo_head h1, 
    .naboo_head h1 a, 
    .heading-2, 
    .heading-3,
    .naboo_head .head_informations,
    .naboo_head .quote ,
    .pageedito h2,
    #naboo_menu_list_music .tinyscroll_overview > a, 
    #naboo_menu_list_music .tinyscroll_overview .folder, 
    #naboo_menu_list_music .tinyscroll_overview .block_cat-menu > a, 
    #naboo_menu_list_music .tinyscroll_overview .block_folder > a, 
    #naboo_menu_list_music .tinyscroll_overview .apps_folder > a,
    .empty_module strong,
    .block_cover,
    .ts_fff,
    .results,
    .btn
        {text-shadow: none !important;}

}
